testsuite.name: com.tddacademy.zoo.controller.ZooControllerTest

testcase.name: GET /api/zoos should return empty list when no zoos exist
Should handle malformed JSON in POST request
DELETE /api/zoos/{id} should return 404 when zoo does not exist
PUT /api/zoos/{id} should return 404 when zoo does not exist
GET /api/zoos/{id} should return 404 when zoo does not exist
Should handle malformed JSON in PUT request
GET /api/zoos/{id} should return zoo when it exists
Should return proper content type for all responses
